node_info.description: Split data into batches and iterate over each batch
node_info.name: splitInBatches

properties.displayName: You may not need this node — n8n nodes automatically run once for each input item. More info
properties.name: splitInBatchesNotice
batchSize
properties.description: The number of items to return with each call

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the node starts again from the beginning of the input items. This will treat incoming data as a new set rather than continuing with the previous items.

options.name: reset
options.description: Whether the node starts again from the beginning of the input items. This will treat incoming data as a new set rather than continuing with the previous items.

splitInBatchesNotice.displayName: You may not need this node — n8n nodes automatically run once for each input item. More info
splitInBatchesNotice.name: splitInBatchesNotice

subProperties.name: reset
subProperties.description: Whether the node starts again from the beginning of the input items. This will treat incoming data as a new set rather than continuing with the previous items.

notices.name: splitInBatchesNotice
notices.text: You may not need this node — n8n nodes automatically run once for each input item. More info

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
